mapper.select: SELECT 1 FROM haw.member A WHERE email = #{email} GROUP BY email LIMIT 1
SELECT 1 FROM haw.member A WHERE nickname = #{nickname} GROUP BY nickname LIMIT 1

SELECT A.member_no , A.name , A.email , A.password , A.nickname , A.tutorial_yn , A.ip , A.input_dt , A.time_stamp , B.team_no , A.grade FROM haw.member A LEFT OUTER JOIN haw.member_team B ON (A.member_no = B.member_no AND B.member_yn = true) WHERE A.email = #{email} LIMIT 1

SELECT A.team_no , A.team_nm , A.team_tot , A.team_cnt , A.color , B.arms_img AS image , A.point , A.description FROM haw.team A LEFT OUTER JOIN haw.arms B ON (A.arms_no = B.arms_no) WHERE A.team_no = #{team_no}
